sen.e: After the ritsuryo legal codes was established, the doctors of Ondo were positioned under Daigakuryo, but because their role was to teach reading aloud of the scriptures which was the first course of Confucianism for the students of the regular course (future Myogyodo, the Confucian department of Daigakuryo), their position was only supplementary and it was not stated on the regulations that they had own students like Sando (mathmatics) and Shodo (calligraphy).
